name: Dustin Maki
text: Silent on details.  Crew is efficient at installing/servicing parts but ignorant of any business details like price estimates, options, schedule and unwilling to discuss water quality problems with the well.  Just part swappers it seems.  Owner is too busy, distracted, and uninterested to answer simple questions.  Flat rate $1800 pump install but they wont say what pump they plan to install.  Whatever happens to be on the truck that day.  Owner talked badly about other local well service and their products but never said anything good about her own.  When I called other local well services to locate the specific pump I needed for a solar application, they were all complimentary of Houston apparently due to a family connection.  Competitors did a better job selling her services than she did.  I think these are good people overstressed by their situation, but they still need to learn how to talk to customers.

name: Marco Daniele
text: Service was great. Lost water pressure and called at 7am. They were there by 9:30 and I was up and running without issues in about an hour.

name: Jon Showalter
text:
Good customer service and reasonably priced.
Would recommend to anyone with well problems.

name: frank tobey
text: Great service.

name: John Olmstead
text: Woke up yesterday morning with no water. Called Zonda, they were here in a couple of hours and had my well up and running in short order. Great service, reasonable price, highly reccomend.

name: V J
text: This well company is outstanding! Friday evening around 6 pm, we lost water. I called 5 well companies, hoping one could come out and look at the problem. We thought it was a simple pressure switch issue. Zondra texted us first thing in the morning, even though she was out of town, to touch base with us, find out if anyone else had been able to come out. Another company did come out, giving us the bad news that our well pump had broken off the spool. This company had no other idea, other than drill another well. We texted Zondra with the diagnosis, she told us she has a tool to "fish" the well pump out, she could be here Monday morning. They were promptly here at the time, they said they would. It took them just shy of an hour to get the pump out, replace the parts and get us up and running with water and the repair was reasonable too! Zondra Houston Well Services is second to none!

name: Krisi Smothers
text: I have to say I did not have to utilize the services. I called to see if they provided septic services and unfortunately they do not. She however helped me out and gave me the contact information of someone in my county that does. She went above and beyond to help me out with that when she didn't have to. That is some seriously great customer service and if the other services that they provide are anything like this then I can say that you are in wonderful hands!

name: Katrina Greer
text: I cannot say enough good things about Zondra Houston Well Services! -- professional attitude, fast and courteous response, quick well repair, reasonable price, and super NICE people! Awesome service!

name: Bobby Bright
text: Faren was very helpful and professional. I will be returning to do business.

name: David Carlson
text: Great place to unload. Friendly people..

name: Michael Isbell
text: Wouldn't  take back a cash  ticket  that wasn't  but a day old. So probably  want be doing business  there again.

name: Luke Dunkling
text: My company does business with them and Empire is always professional...

name: Roy Latty
text: My first time to visit this business service was great worker were very helpful and very nice I give empire pipe and supply a 5 star  and as far as the Google maps great work took me right to the door I also give them a 5 star because it was over 100 miles from my house thanks for all your help

name: J Swenson
text: Great people

name: J. Parker.
text: Great service

name: Tina Fields
text: Wonderful

name: bennie perdue
text: Friendly people.

name: Brandon Downing
text: Great people to work with. Friendly and helpful.

name: Kyle Adams
text: Great company, high values, good work.
